title: Machine Safeguarding Principles
headline: Learn how to protect equipment and workers from hazards posed by machines in this free online health and safety course.
description: This health and safety course explains how machine-safeguarding practices can prevent machinery-related accidents. The course focuses on hazard identification and risk assessment and shows you how to manage risks using the hierarchy of control measures. The course will also provide an in-depth look at the various types of machine guards and safeguarding devices used to control common machinery hazards and meet international standards.
courseDescription:
This health and safety course provides a comprehensive overview of the principles of machine guarding. We discuss the various machinery hazards and outline their identification and assessment techniques. The course explains the ‘hierarchy of controls’ used to manage these hazards and emphasises the most effective control method: inherently safe machinery design. We also explain how to use administrative controls and personal protective equipment to manage risks.

The main focus of the course is on engineering control measures, including machine guards and different types of safeguarding devices. We provide a comprehensive understanding of physical guards, interlocking devices, protective devices, presence-sensing devices, emergency stop devices and warning systems. Lastly, the course goes over the requirements for designing machine guards and calculating safe distances for installing protective devices.

Whether you are a worker, supervisor or health and safety professional, this course is an essential resource for anyone looking to learn about machine guarding and the best practices used to control machinery hazards. We provide a thorough understanding of machine-safeguarding principles and offer an opportunity to add an international accreditation to your resume. Such a qualification demonstrates your commitment to workplace safety and your expertise in machine safeguarding, adding a valuable element to your CV. Take advantage of this opportunity to enhance your professional skills and sign up for this course today to learn how to protect health and safety in the workplace as you avoid accidents caused by machinery.
